artist: Artist: Roy Lichtenstein; Publisher: Gemini G.E.L., Los Angeles
creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: black ground; rectangular image of face made up of white lines; three waves at right form abstract hair; black dots on yellow ground to left of face; yellow arc, ULC
markings: LLC, in pencil: [A/P III]; LRC, publisher\'s blindstamp: [c (inside a circle)] and [(Gemini symbol inside a circle)]
medium: Color lithograph and line-cut with embossing on handmade paper
provenance: The artist (1970-1997, sold to Mersky); Mary and Robert Mersky, Minneapolis (1997- 2012, given to MIA)
title: Modern Head #2
